sentences.sContent: The police need to be briefed beforehand on how to deal with this sort of situation.
sentences.sCn: 需要事先告诉警察这种情况怎样处理。

sentences.sContent: When you give a speech, it’s natural to feel nervous beforehand.
sentences.sCn: 你在演讲之前感到紧张是很自然的。

remMethod.val: before(在…以前) ＋ hand(手) → 抢在…之前下手 → 预先， 事先

trans.tranOther: before something else happens or is done
